name: Crorepati Hindi Free
description:
Crorepati Hindi Free is a general knowledge Hindi game with an interesting game play. You will have to answer 12 questions before you reach a top score of one crore. Depending on each level of questions, you will see the complexity increases.

The game gives you the below life-line options,

1. Phone - A - Friend
2. Fifty - Fifty
3. Audience Poll

You can also see the answer if you answer wrongly to the questions. You can see the last five scores as well.

The game is our take on to improve your general knowledge on Indian Affairs, Indian Sports, Indian Economy, Indian History, Geography, Politics, Bollywood movies etc.

We have compiled more than 2000 General Knowledge questions in Hindi which you can play it to improve your GK.
